who_its_for.title: Is This Service Right for You?
best_for: Businesses without a website losing customers to competitors
Companies with outdated sites that don't convert
Startups launching new products or services
Businesses ready to establish a strong online presence
not_for: Those needing only graphic design without development
Large enterprises with internal IT teams
Projects requiring only content updates to existing sites

problem_solution.title: From Invisible to Unstoppable
problem_solution.problem_text: Without a professional website, you're invisible to potential customers. Every day without an online presence means lost leads, missed opportunities, and revenue going to your competitors.
problem_solution.solution_text: We build modern, lightning-fast websites optimized for search engines and conversions. Custom design, mobile-first approach, and clean code that performs.
problem_solution.result_text: More qualified leads, stronger brand credibility, and a 24/7 sales channel that works while you sleep. Your website becomes your most effective salesperson.

items.title: Custom Design
items.description: No templates — every website is designed specifically for your brand and goals

items.title: Mobile-First
items.description: Over 60% of traffic comes from mobile. We design for smartphones first

items.title: SEO Built-In
items.description: Technical SEO optimization included so you can be found on Google

items.title: Post-Launch Support
items.description: We don't disappear after launch. Ongoing support and maintenance available

items.question: How long does website development take?
items.answer: Development time depends on project complexity. A landing page takes 2-3 weeks, a corporate website 4-6 weeks, and an e-commerce store 6-8 weeks. We'll provide an exact timeline after discussing your requirements.

items.question: What's included in the price?
items.answer: Our pricing includes design, development, mobile optimization, basic SEO setup, contact forms, and initial content integration. Hosting, domain, and ongoing maintenance are quoted separately.

items.question: Do you provide hosting?
items.answer: Yes, we can set up and manage hosting for you on reliable platforms like Vercel, Netlify, or traditional hosting providers. We'll recommend the best option based on your needs and budget.

items.question: Can I edit content myself?
items.answer: Absolutely. We can integrate a content management system (CMS) that allows you to easily update text, images, and other content without any technical knowledge.

items.question: What about SEO?
items.answer: Every website we build includes technical SEO optimization: proper HTML structure, meta tags, fast loading speed, mobile responsiveness, and sitemap. For ongoing SEO marketing, we can discuss additional services.

cta_section.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta_section.description: Get a free, no-obligation quote for your project. We'll discuss your goals and provide a detailed proposal within 24 hours.

chatbots.title: Chatbots
chatbots.description: Automate customer communication with intelligent bots

metadata.title: Chatbot Development | Telegram, WhatsApp, Website Bots | VektaDev
metadata.description: Custom chatbot development for Telegram, WhatsApp, Viber and websites. 24/7 customer support automation, CRM integration, AI-powered responses. Free consultation!
metadata.keywords: chatbot, telegram bot, whatsapp bot, customer support automation, AI chatbot, chatbot development, messenger bot, CRM integration

chatbots.hero_title: Automate Customer Support and Save Time
chatbots.hero_description: Intelligent chatbots for Telegram, WhatsApp, and your website. Answer customer questions, take orders and bookings — even while you sleep.

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.description: Bot works around the clock without breaks and weekends

integration.title: CRM integration
integration.description: Automatic lead addition to the system

who_its_for.title: Is a chatbot right for you?
best_for: E-commerce stores needing order status updates
not_for: Complex B2B sales requiring human touch
One-time projects without ongoing customer support

problem_solution.title: From overwhelmed to automated
problem_solution.problem_text: Your team is overwhelmed answering the same questions over and over. Customers message after hours and on weekends, but no one responds. Every missed inquiry is a lost sales opportunity.
problem_solution.solution_text: AI-powered chatbot that automatically handles 80% of customer queries. Responds instantly, 24/7, on Telegram, WhatsApp, or your website chat. When it can't answer — it hands off to a human.
problem_solution.result_text: 24/7 availability, faster responses, and lower support costs. Your team handles only complex issues while customers enjoy instant service.

items.title: Custom bot logic
items.description: No generic templates — the bot is tailored to your business and processes

items.title: CRM/ERP integration
items.description: Bot connects to your systems — orders, bookings, customer database

items.title: Analytics dashboard
items.description: Track conversation stats, popular questions, and bot performance

items.title: Human handoff
items.description: When the bot can't answer, it smoothly transfers to your team

items.question: Which platforms do you support?
items.answer: We build chatbots for Telegram, WhatsApp, Viber, and website chat widgets. We can also integrate with Facebook Messenger or Instagram.

items.question: Can the bot integrate with my CRM?
items.answer: Yes, we integrate chatbots with popular CRM and ERP systems. The bot can automatically add leads, update customer data, and create orders in your system.

items.question: How smart is the bot?
items.answer: We offer both rule-based bots (scenarios and buttons) and AI bots with natural language understanding. The choice depends on your needs and budget.

items.question: What happens when the bot can't answer?
items.answer: The bot can hand off to a human, save the question for later response, or ask the customer to call. You decide how it should work.

items.question: How much does maintenance cost?
items.answer: Maintenance costs depend on the platform and message volume. Telegram is free, WhatsApp Business API has per-message fees. We'll provide detailed pricing during consultation.

cta_section.title: Ready to automate?
cta_section.description: Book a free consultation. We'll show you how a chatbot can streamline customer service for your business.

mobile_apps.title: Mobile Apps
mobile_apps.description: Development of native and cross-platform mobile applications

metadata.title: Mobile App Development | iOS & Android Apps | VektaDev
metadata.description: Professional mobile app development for iOS and Android. React Native, Flutter - cross-platform apps from one codebase. UX/UI design included. Discuss your app idea!
metadata.keywords: mobile app development, iOS app, Android app, React Native, Flutter, cross-platform app, mobile application, app development company

mobile_apps.hero_description: We build mobile apps that delight users and drive your business. React Native, Flutter — modern technologies for faster time-to-market.

native.title: Native quality
native.description: High performance and smooth animations like native apps

cross.title: Cross-platform
cross.description: One codebase for iOS and Android — faster development, lower costs

ux.title: UX/UI included
ux.description: We design intuitive interfaces that users will love

support.title: Post-launch support
support.description: Updates, bug fixes, and feature development after launch

who_its_for.title: Is Mobile App Development Right for You?
not_for: Ideas without a clear business model

problem_solution.title: From Idea to App Store
problem_solution.problem_text: Your customers expect a mobile experience. Competitors already have their apps. Every day without mobile presence means lost customers and missed engagement opportunities.
problem_solution.solution_text: Cross-platform app built with React Native or Flutter. One team, one codebase, two platforms. Faster development, lower costs, and consistent user experience across iOS and Android.
problem_solution.result_text: Faster time-to-market, lower development and maintenance costs, consistent experience for all users. Your app in App Store and Google Play ready to win customers.

items.title: Cross-platform expertise
items.description: We specialize in React Native and Flutter — proven technologies used by top companies

items.title: App store submission included
items.description: We handle the entire publishing process for App Store and Google Play

items.title: Post-launch support
items.description: We don't disappear after launch. We offer support and development packages

items.title: UX/UI design included
items.description: Every app includes professional design tailored to your brand

items.question: iOS, Android, or both?
items.answer: We recommend building for both platforms simultaneously using cross-platform technologies (React Native, Flutter). You pay for one project and get an app for both iOS and Android. However, if your target audience is heavily concentrated on one platform, we can start there.

items.question: How long does app development take?
items.answer: A simple MVP takes 2-3 months. A moderately complex app with backend 3-5 months. Complex apps with multiple integrations 5-8 months. We'll provide an exact timeline after analyzing your requirements.

items.question: Do you publish to app stores?
items.answer: Yes, we handle the entire publishing process. We prepare graphics, descriptions, help with developer accounts, and guide you through Apple and Google review. App Store and Google Play submission is included in the price.

items.question: What about ongoing maintenance?
items.answer: After launch, we offer support packages that include: bug fixes, compatibility updates for new iOS/Android versions, minor improvements, and performance monitoring. We can also develop new features.

items.question: Can you work with an existing backend?
items.answer: Absolutely. If you already have a backend or API, we'll integrate the mobile app with it. If you need a backend, we can build that too or help you choose BaaS (Backend as a Service) solutions.

about.title: We Build Software That Grows Businesses
about.description: We help ambitious companies across Poland and Europe create websites, chatbots, and mobile apps that drive measurable results — more customers, higher efficiency, and faster growth.
about.value_prop_intro: We're not a typical IT agency. We combine solid development craftsmanship with business thinking to deliver solutions that actually work.
value_prop_points: Results-focused approach — every project starts with understanding your business goals, not just technical requirements
Transparency and predictability — clear pricing, regular communication, and deadlines we actually meet
Full-service capability — from strategy through development to deployment and ongoing support
AI and automation expertise — practical implementations of ChatGPT, chatbots, and automated workflows
Local presence, European standards — Poland-based team working to GDPR and EU best practices
about.story_p1: VektaDev was founded in 2020 based on a simple observation: many businesses need professional IT solutions but struggle to find teams that understand both technology and business. Too often, we saw projects that looked good on paper but failed to deliver real results.
about.story_p2: We started VektaDev to change that. Our team includes developers, designers, and AI specialists who've worked on projects ranging from startups to international enterprises. That experience taught us that successful IT projects depend not just on code, but on truly understanding client needs and translating them into working solutions.
about.story_p3: Today we work with companies from Poland, Germany, and across Europe, helping them build websites that convert, chatbots that save time, and mobile apps that create competitive advantage. We treat every project as a partnership — because that's the only way to deliver something that truly works.
about.approach_intro: Working with us is transparent and predictable. We know your time is valuable, so we've built a process that minimizes uncertainty and maximizes efficiency.

approach_steps.title: Discovery Call
approach_steps.description: We start with a free conversation to understand your goals and challenges. No sales pressure — we want to see if we can genuinely help.

approach_steps.title: Analysis and Proposal
approach_steps.description: We prepare a detailed proposal with clear scope, timeline, and budget. No hidden costs or ambiguity.

approach_steps.title: Development with Regular Updates
approach_steps.description: During the project, we keep you informed of progress. You have access to work-in-progress versions and can provide feedback along the way.

approach_steps.title: Launch and Support
approach_steps.description: After launch, we don't disappear. We offer ongoing support and remain available for questions or future development needs.

trust_signals.title: 5+ Years in Business
trust_signals.description: Since 2020, we've been delivering IT projects for companies across various industries in Poland and Europe.

trust_signals.title: Experienced Team
trust_signals.description: Our developers and designers have years of commercial experience working on projects of various scales.

trust_signals.title: Accountability for Results
trust_signals.description: We don't end the relationship when we hand over a project. We care about whether the solution works and delivers value.

trust_signals.title: Clear Communication
trust_signals.description: We speak directly about possibilities, limitations, and risks. No unrealistic promises.

focus.description: We focus on achieving our clients' business goals

intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.text: VektaDev ("we", "us", or "our") respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you visit our website and use our contact form.

controller.title: 2. Data Controller
controller.text: The data controller responsible for your personal data is:

collection.title: 3. Data We Collect
collection.text: We collect personal data that you voluntarily provide when using our contact form:
items: Name — to address you properly in our response
Email address — to reply to your inquiry
Phone number (optional) — for callback if requested
Message content — to understand your inquiry or project needs
collection.automatic_text: Our website may also collect basic technical data necessary for proper functioning, such as IP address, browser type, and access times. This data is processed by our hosting provider.

purpose.title: 4. How We Use Your Data
purpose.text: We process your personal data for the following purposes:
items: Responding to your inquiries and requests
Communicating about potential projects and services
Providing customer support
Improving our website and services

legal_basis.title: 5. Legal Basis for Processing
legal_basis.text: Under GDPR, we process your data based on:
items: Your consent — when you submit the contact form
Legitimate interest — to respond to your inquiry and provide services
Contractual necessity — when processing is required to fulfill a service agreement

third_parties.title: 6. Third-Party Services
third_parties.text: To operate our website and communicate with you, we use trusted third-party services:
items: Resend — for email delivery. Your contact form submissions are sent via Resend's secure email infrastructure. Their privacy policy is available at resend.com/legal/privacy-policy

Vercel — for website hosting. Our website is hosted on Vercel's cloud platform, which may process technical data like IP addresses for security and performance purposes. Their privacy policy is available at vercel.com/legal/privacy-policy
third_parties.note: We carefully select our service providers to ensure they comply with GDPR and maintain appropriate security standards.

cookies.title: 7. Cookies and Analytics
cookies.text: Our website currently uses only essential cookies necessary for basic functionality. We do not use tracking cookies or third-party analytics services at this time. If we implement analytics in the future, we will update this policy and seek your consent where required.

retention.title: 8. Data Retention
retention.text: We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes described in this policy. Contact form inquiries are typically retained for up to 12 months after your last communication with us, unless a longer retention period is required for legal or business purposes.

rights.title: 9. Your Rights Under GDPR
rights.text: Under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have the following rights:
items: Right to access — You can request a copy of the personal data we hold about you
Right to rectification — You can ask us to correct inaccurate or incomplete data
Right to erasure — You can request deletion of your personal data ('right to be forgotten')
Right to restrict processing — You can ask us to limit how we use your data
Right to data portability — You can request your data in a portable format
Right to object — You can object to our processing of your data
Right to withdraw consent — You can withdraw your consent at any time
rights.exercise: To exercise any of these rights, please contact us at hello@vektadev.com. We will respond to your request within 30 days.

security.title: 10. Data Security
security.text: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. This includes using secure HTTPS connections, encrypted email transmission, and limiting access to personal data to authorized personnel only.

changes.title: 11. Changes to This Policy
changes.text: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date. We encourage you to review this policy periodically.

contact.title: 12. Contact Us
contact.text: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, your personal data, or wish to exercise your rights, please contact us:
details: Address: ul. Michała Kajki 10-12, 10-547 Olsztyn, Poland

complaints.title: 13. Complaints
complaints.text: If you believe your data protection rights have been violated, you have the right to lodge a complaint with the Polish Data Protection Authority (UODO) or your local supervisory authority.

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.acceptance_text: By using this website, you agree to the terms of use.

terms.changes_text: We reserve the right to change these terms at any time.
